attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
N.I:YK934454A
3.11.08
Dear Sir Brown,
I have a problem with Motherwell.
I have done all they required me to do,yet nothing is happening.
My Pension Credit was cut off on August 18,I presented myself in Folkestone on September 9th.
All their questions were answered about four weeks ago.I am desperate,and am also writing to Pr N Sarkozy.
Sincerely Yours,
P.S

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
